articles.title: As invasion threat looms, Ukraine asks for weapons — and Canada makes evacuation plans - CBC News
articles.description: Canada faced stepped-up pressure Tuesday to match U.S. and United Kingdom shipments of defensive weapons to Ukraine as the possibility of a Russian invasion continues to hang over eastern Europe.
articles.content:
Canada faced stepped-up pressure Tuesday to match U.S. and United Kingdom shipments of defensive weapons to Ukraine as the threat of a Russian invasion continues to hang over eastern Europe.

articles.title: Novak Djokovic leaves behind Australia’s ‘white torture’ - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: Refugees in same detention hotel that held superstar tennis player look to him for solidarity.
articles.content:
At least Novak Djokovic was able to go home.
During his short, sensational captivity in the Park Hotel, Melbourne, the worlds best tennis player was as close as any member of the public can get to a… [+7843 chars]

articles.title: Return of the flu: EU faces threat of prolonged 'twindemic' - TODAY
articles.description: BRUSSELS — Influenza has returned to Europe at a faster-than-expected rate this winter after almost disappearing last year, raising concerns about a prolonged "twindemic" with Covid-19 amid some doubts about the effectiveness of flu vaccines.

articles.title: Orlando Pirates striker Mhango eyes move to Europe - Goal.com
articles.description: The American star has missed several months after suffering a hamstring injury during World Cup qualifiers.
